author: @texags
title: 2025 OL Connor Carty calls committing to A&M a 'dream come true' | TexAgs
text: [Texas A&M Football Recruiting](/football-recruiting) 2025 OL Connor Carty calls committing to A&M a 'dream come true' April 18, 2024 8,241 2025 Prosper offensive lineman [Connor Carty](/players/19167/connor-carty) (6-foot-5, 300 pounds) is regarded as one of the top offensive linemen in Texas, and now he is a Fightin‚Äô Texas A&M Aggie. He knew his choice on his recent visit to Texas A&M, and after returning home, he called coach Mike Elko to deliver the news. He also spoke to TexAgs about his choice and what went into his decision. How does it feel to let everyone know you are heading to Texas A&M? Man, it‚Äôs awesome, you know. Never miss the latest news from TexAgs! author: Chris Wathan
title: How Dan James became the 'main man' for Leeds United and Wales - BBC Sport
text:
2026 World Cup qualifying: Wales v Kazakhstan
Venue: Cardiff City Stadium Date: Saturday, 22 March Kick-off: 19:45 GMT
Coverage: Watch on BBC One Wales, iPlayer, BBC Sport website and app, plus S4C via iPlayer. Text commentary and highlights on BBC Sport website and app. Listen live on BBC Radio Wales, BBC Radio Cymru, BBC Radio 5 Sport Extra.
Eight games from winning promotion to the Premier League. Eight fixtures standing in-between Wales and the 2026 World Cup.
Leeds United's Dan James knows he could about to have the year of his life.
Fortunately for club and country, he's having the season of his life.
Once widely criticised for lacking end product, he is now on track for a career-best tally of goals and assists in a single campaign.
"Outstanding," Daniel Farke has said of someone who has become integral to Championship leaders Leeds' bid to return to the top-flight, a player happy to carry the weighty Elland Road expectations of success.
Craig Bellamy will be hoping for just as much attacking influence on the international stage as Wales plot their path to north America.
And James is not shying away from it.
"I'm not a young player anymore," he says. "I want to try and be that main man."
But, even for a player of electrifying pace, getting to that stage has taken some time.
Bellamy was made to be a manager - Hughes
Published 10 hours ago Who would you pick for Wales' World Cup qualifier?
Published 2 days ago 'That'll hurt forever' - World Cup pain drives Bellamy
Published 2 days ago 'Too good for the Championship' Maybe because he still appears somewhat fresh-faced, it's easy to forget how much 27-year-old James has already packed into his career.
From his acceleration onto the scene as a teenager at Swansea City, there have been two major finals, 55 caps, and two ¬£20m-plus moves since.
But there have also been crushing disappointments to deal with. From losing his father Kevan just weeks before completing a dream move to Manchester United in 2019, to the missed penalty that denied Wales shoot-out qualification for Euro 2024.
There was even the fact Leeds ‚Äì who he joined for ¬£25m in 2021 - had seemingly washed their hands of him, sending him out on loan to Fulham a year later.
It added to questions of whether the winger could cut it at the top level, something he was denied at answering when ‚Äì back at Leeds ‚Äì he was part of a side that lost last year's play-off final to Southampton.
"It would have been quite easy for him to have come back and think he was not wanted, that his days were numbered, and it was all against him," says Jon Newsome, a title-winner at Leeds.
"But he got his head down and become a better player. I think you'd be hard pressed to find a better performer for Leeds. He's too good for the Championship."
Ten goals and nine assists ‚Äì already just one goal contribution shy of last year's total - suggests he is right.
Flourishing in the "heavy" Leeds shirt James' frightening speed has always made him a dangerous player.
Or "menacing" as Bellamy once described him, having been without him for the first four games of his unbeaten start to life as Wales manager in the successful Nations League campaign.
But there is more to James' game now. A hardened mindset has seemingly brought a sharper edge ‚Äì and, to use an adjective James repeatedly used about his improvements ‚Äì a more "ruthless" player.
"As a winger I want to be as direct as possible, not turning things down," he says of what's changed, besides staying injury-free.
"Sometimes I look back at games and I've been quite safe. That might look good from the outside, keeping the ball, but ultimately I'm in the team to try and create things. That constant mindset of 'can I get a goal or an assist?' ‚Äì and believing that.
"And when you do give the ball away, it's so important the reaction is to want it again.
"You might get tackled nine times out of ten but it's about that tenth time where something will happen, and I'm trying to keep that mindset."
It's been noticed. Leeds fans have found a new hero, James stepping into the space left when Crysencio Summerville moved to West Ham United last summer.
"There's definitely a difference this season," says Newsome, a co-commentator with BBC Radio Leeds.
"His final ball and end product is a lot better. He realises his assets - like that pace - and uses them to their best at every opportunity, but there's a maturity to his play.
"There's the responsibility of being an older player now, and suddenly the main man and coping with the expectation.
"The Leeds shirt can be heavy to wear at times, and it's too much for some. He's flourished."
This video can not be played
To play this video you need to enable JavaScript in your browser. Media caption, World Cup disappointment drives Wales forward James
An unlikely leader That comfort in being the go-to attacking hope has seen James' confidence levels rocket, as well as new leadership qualities shine.
Farke says it's less about speeches but about work-rate, setting standards ‚Äì music to the ears of Bellamy whose Wales team have similar pass, press and pace-filled principles.
"When you start the press off you can get the boys up for it on the pitch rather than off it," says James, who adds he's happy with the added responsibility at club and country.
"It doesn't add any pressure. There's games where things you try maybe don't go right, but you just continue to try and do the right stuff and keep trying to be that main man."
It's a trait James says he looked up to in Bellamy when the manager was himself an explosive attacker in the red of Wales.
Having only just shaken off a hamstring injury when he met up with the new-look Wales for the first time in November, James is eager to show he has soaked up the advice of an individual he takes inspiration from.
"He had that work-rate and he always wanted the ball, demanded the ball," he says.
"He wants the same from us, but the biggest thing I've tried to take into my game is to always get at your man.
"It's easy to get the ball, pass backwards when things aren't going right - and much tougher when it hasn't gone right to have the mindset of going again.
"Sometimes there's a risk of players or the crowd getting on you ‚Äì but not here and the manager has your back."
Image source, Getty Images Image caption, Dan James started his youth career at Hull City before joining Swansea City's academy
A manager and a player of 'ruthless mentality' It all suggests Wales' adrenaline-fuelled style that saw them top their Nations League group is going to carry on into the World Cup campaign.
And with James ready to embody the ethos when the World Cup campaign kicks off against Kazakhstan in Cardiff ‚Äì and prepared be the main man, just as Bellamy once was.
"Exactly, that was him as a player; he had that ruthless mentality, he believed he was going to win the game for the team," he says, perhaps conscious that Wales will be missing another key and in-form attacker in the injured Harry Wilson.
"To have that person behind you, to put you in the situations to go and effect games and show your attributes, that's brilliant to know as a player."
And a knowledge that could see James' impressive improvements continue in what could be a memorable year for club and country.
Related topics Wales Men's Football Team Championship Football FIFA World Cup Leeds United

author: @record_mexico
title: Sonrixs podr√≠a perder la movilidad de su mano tras un accidente jugando vencidas
text:
Sonrixs podr√≠a perder la movilidad de su mano tras un accidente jugando vencidas
[Mariana Alc√°ntara Contreras](/autor/mariana-alcantara-contreras)
El influencer [Sonrixs ](https://www.record.com.mx/contra)volvi√≥ a las redes sociales tras una cirug√≠a de emergencia, donde le operaron un hueso que se rompi√≥ en tres partes. Desde una camilla en el hospital, comparti√≥ un video en TikTok explicando su situaci√≥n y la raz√≥n de su hospitalizaci√≥n.
Sonrixs", podr√≠a perder la movilidad de su mano
Hace unos d√≠as, Jorge Iv√°n Hern√°ndez Ram√≠rez, el influencer, public√≥ un video desde un hospital con el brazo enyesado, pero no dio detalles sobre su situaci√≥n. Sus fans se sorprendieron, ya que poco antes hab√≠a compartido im√°genes de una celebraci√≥n familiar. En el video, mencion√≥ que iba a ser operado y que todo sucedi√≥ r√°pidamente, expresando su confianza en que todo saldr√≠a bien.
Sonrixs inform√≥ que el juego de 'las vencidas' o 'fuercitas' podr√≠a costarle la movilidad de su brazo, ya que result√≥ en la ruptura de uno de sus huesos.
‚ÄúPodr√≠a perder la movilidad de mi mano. Mi hueso se rompi√≥ en tres pedazos y provoc√≥ que pasara por una cirug√≠a de cinco horas, me pusieron 11 tornillos y una placa de hombro a codo que me va a acompa√±ar para el resto mi vida‚Äù, coment√≥ el influencer.
La cirug√≠a del influencer dur√≥ cinco horas y consisti√≥ en la colocaci√≥n de 11 tornillos y una placa de hombro a codo, que lo acompa√±ar√° de por vida.
‚ÄúTodo esto por un juego que alguna vez todos hemos jugado. Que yo cre√≠a que era inofensivo: las vencidas o las fuercitas. Los doctores me dijeron que los accidentes as√≠ son comunes. Me gustar√≠a que t√∫ supieras los riesgos porque yo no lo sab√≠a y me podr√≠a cambiar la vida‚Äù.
Los doctores indican que no hay certeza sobre si el Sonrixs recuperar√° la movilidad en su brazo; se necesita tiempo para saberlo.
‚ÄúLos doctores me dijeron que fue una cirug√≠a compleja debido a que cuando mi hueso se rompi√≥ aplast√≥ el nervio radial que es el encargado de hacer movimientos muy importantes en mi mano y que tuve la gran suerte de que no se rompi√≥. La mano a√∫n no la puedo mover y la movilidad podr√≠a regresar o no, no lo sabemos, es cuesti√≥n de tiempo", se√±al√≥.
Gracias a todos por sus bonitos mensajes
[TAMBI√âN TE PUEDE INTERESAR: Utop√≠as CDMX: Direcci√≥n de las 16 nuevas instalaciones y atracciones que tendr√°n](https://www.record.com.mx/contra/utopias-cdmx-direccion-de-las-16-nuevas-instalaciones-y-atracciones-que-tendran)

Los precios de las criptomonedas son extremadamente vol√°tiles y pueden verse afectados por factores externos de tipo financiero, regulatorio o pol√≠tico. Operar sobre m√°rgenes aumenta los riesgos financieros. Antes de lanzarse a invertir en un instrumento financiero o criptomoneda, inf√≥rmese debidamente de los riesgos y costes asociados a este tipo operaciones en los mercados financieros. Fije unos objetivos de inversi√≥n adecuados a su nivel de experiencia y su apetito por el riesgo y, siempre que sea necesario, busque asesoramiento profesional. Fusion Media quiere recordarle que la informaci√≥n contenida en este sitio web no se ofrece necesariamente ni en tiempo real ni de forma exacta. Los datos y precios de la web no siempre proceden de operadores de mercado o bolsas, por lo que los precios podr√≠an diferir del precio real de cualquier mercado. Son precios orientativos que en ning√∫n caso deben utilizarse con fines burs√°tiles. Ni Fusion Media ni ninguno de los proveedores de los datos de esta web asumen responsabilidad alguna por las p√©rdidas o resultados perniciosos de sus operaciones basados en su confianza en la informaci√≥n contenida en la web. Queda prohibida la total reproducci√≥n, modificaci√≥n, transmisi√≥n o distribuci√≥n de los datos publicados en este sitio web sin la autorizaci√≥n previa por escrito de Fusion Media y/o del proveedor de los mismos. Todos los derechos de propiedad intelectual est√°n reservados a los proveedores y/o bolsa responsable de dichos los datos. Fusion Media puede recibir contraprestaci√≥n econ√≥mica de las empresas que se anuncian en la p√°gina seg√∫n su interacci√≥n con √©stas o con los anuncios que aqu√≠ se publican. Este aviso legal est√° traducido de su texto original en ingl√©s, versi√≥n que prevalecer√° en caso de conflicto entre el texto original en ingl√©s y su traducci√≥n al espa√±ol. ¬© 2007-2024 - Fusion Media Ltd. Todos los Derechos Reservados. T√©rminos y Condiciones Pol√≠tica de privacidad Advertencia de Riesgo

author: newsherald
title: Molalani residents finally to receive new tar road | Letaba Herald
text:
Last week, Maruleng Local Municipality Mayor Tsheko Musolwa, introduced the contractor, TND Trading Enterprises, to the community during a handover ceremony in Molalani. The project will cost R27m and will create jobs for 30 people. Musolwa said on March 2 the municipality met with the Barcelona community to discuss three projects. ‚ÄúThey had complaints on the roads and a bridge, and we told them we would return with a response.‚Äù
‚ÄúThey said that when it rains, they cannot cross a stream and children cannot go to school. Access to Santeng village was also problematic and because of the road they do not receive any services from the municipality,‚Äù said Musolwa. He said the community stated that the road was riddled with potholes and that the tar had disintegrated. They saw that the roads were being repaired in other villages, but their problems were not addressed.
Also read: Maruleng mayor keeps promise for new road
‚ÄúToday I‚Äôm here with the answers to your cries,‚Äù said the mayor. He said the former mayor tarred the road that connects with the D21. ‚ÄúThis was a long time ago and as you can see for yourselves, it is badly damaged.‚Äù He said during the meeting earlier in Barcelona, residents requested rehabilitation of the road. ‚ÄúWhen we came here, we wanted to introduce two projects, but we have added a third one. The first one is that this week, or next, we will introduce a contractor for the bridge so that they can start the project,‚Äù he added.
He said that after the bridge is completed, they will build a road from Santeng which will cross the bridge from Molalani. ‚ÄúWe heard your complaints and that is why we are here today. We are no longer doing things without alerting the community. We are planning to immediately start with the road to Santeng once we fi nish this one.‚Äù He said the municipality wanted to deliver services to the community, but that they need to follow processes. ‚ÄúI know that we came late but we ended up coming,‚Äù he said.

author: AFP
title: Cor√©e du Nord: Pyongyang critique la vente d‚Äôh√©licopt√®res am√©ricains √† S√©oul - 20 minutes
text: La Cor√©e du Nord a qualifi√© jeudi d‚Äôacte ¬´imprudent et provocant¬ª la vente par les Am√©ricains d‚Äôh√©licopt√®res Apache √† la Cor√©e du Sud, affirmant qu‚Äôelle y r√©pondrait par un renforcement de son propre arsenal. ¬´Il s‚Äôagit d‚Äôun acte imprudent et provocant¬ª qui vise √† ¬´d√©lib√©r√©ment augmenter l‚Äôinstabilit√© s√©curitaire dans la r√©gion¬ª, a fustig√© dans un communiqu√© le minist√®re de la D√©fense nord-cor√©en. 36 h√©licopt√®res ¬´Nous nous opposons fermement (‚Ä¶) au renforcement militaire (‚Ä¶) des forces vassales¬ª des √âtats-Unis, a-t-il d√©clar√©, critiquant par la m√™me occasion des ventes r√©centes am√©ricaines au Japon et √† d‚Äôautres alli√©s de Washington en Asie-Pacifique. Les √âtats-Unis ont annonc√© lundi avoir approuv√© la vente de jusqu‚Äô√† 36 h√©licopt√®res d‚Äôattaque Apache, ainsi que du mat√©riel li√©, dont des missiles, √† la Cor√©e du Sud pour un total d‚Äôenviron 3,5 milliards de dollars (2,9 milliards de francs). Selon l‚Äôagence am√©ricaine pour la coop√©ration en mati√®re de d√©fense (DSCA), elle doit permettre ¬´d‚Äôam√©liorer les capacit√©s de la R√©publique de Cor√©e (nom officiel de la Cor√©e du Sud) √† faire face aux menaces actuelles et futures¬ª avec ¬´une force capable de dissuader les adversaires¬ª. ¬´Dissuasion strat√©gique¬ª La transaction doit encore √™tre valid√©e par le Congr√®s am√©ricain avant d‚Äô√™tre effective. Cet accord va amener Pyongyang √† ¬´renforcer encore¬ª ses propres moyens de ¬´dissuasion strat√©gique¬ª, a soulign√© vendredi le r√©gime nord-cor√©en. L‚Äôannonce de la vente est intervenue au premier jour des traditionnels exercices militaires annuels men√©s conjointement par Washington et S√©oul. Baptis√©es ¬´Ulchi Freedom Shield¬ª, elles mobiliseront des milliers de militaires jusqu‚Äôau 29 ao√ªt. Washington est le principal alli√© de S√©oul en mati√®re de s√©curit√©.

author: @andaluciainf
title: Antonio Pulido: ‚ÄúDevolvemos a la sociedad parte de lo que recibimos‚Äù | Andaluc√≠a Informaci√≥n. Todas las noticias de Granada
text: El presidente de la Fundaci√≥n Cajasol, Antonio Pulido, se siente orgulloso de la labor que realiza su entidad en Andaluc√≠a, porque est√°n consiguiendo ‚Äúdevolverle a la sociedad parte de lo que recibimos de ella‚Äù, un balance que ha realizado en el programa ‚ÄòAcento Andaluz‚Äô de 7TV en el que ha analizado tambi√©n la situaci√≥n financiera y econ√≥mica. As√≠, Pulido ha considerado sobre el futuro de Unicaja que el ‚Äútama√±o es importante y que tiene que mejorar sus ratios‚Äù para operar en el sistema financiero actual, aunque s√≠ que ha alabado la profesionalizaci√≥n de su equipo‚Äù, porque ‚Äúno podemos estar con cuotas territoriales‚Äù. ‚ÄúEs una reflexi√≥n general‚Äù, insist√≠a Pulido, que s√≠ destacaba que ‚ÄúUnicaja ha hecho una cosa muy bien, que es la profesionalizaci√≥n de su equipo directivo. No podemos estar con cuotas territoriales‚Äù, apuntaba, explicando que si no se huye de los ‚Äúconceptos de origen‚Äù y se aplican criterios estrictamente profesionales, ‚Äúno funciona, ninguna empresa del mundo funciona‚Äù. Pulido tambi√©n ha aplaudido la apuesta por la simplificaci√≥n administrativa emprendida por el Gobierno andaluz e incluso ha invitado al resto de administraciones ‚Äúsean del signo que sean a que encojan de alguna manera los tr√°mites‚Äù, que obligan a una pyme a buscarse una gestor√≠a cuando ‚Äúhay que facilitar lo m√°ximo posible‚Äù. Ha asegurado que la estabilidad pol√≠tica, como la que vive Andaluc√≠a en estos momentos, es un valor de crecimiento y un factor para la inversi√≥n, inversiones que ve algo ralentizadas en Espa√±a por la situaci√≥n pol√≠tica actual, aunque ha considerado que en general ‚Äúva bien, no para un sobresaliente o notable, pero s√≠ un bien‚Äù, ya que s√≥lo algo de freno en las inversiones y el escaso ahorro de las familias como puntos negativos de la econom√≠a actual. Balance de la Fundaci√≥n Cajasol ‚ÄúEstamos llegando, hay capilaridad y la gente se siente identificada‚Äù, dec√≠a Pulido satisfecho al hacer un balance general de la Fundaci√≥n Cajasol, apuntando que est√°n consiguiendo su objetivo, ‚Äúdevolverle a la sociedad parte de lo que recibimos de ella‚Äù, algo que est√°n consiguiendo a trav√©s de la cultura, la acci√≥n social, el emprendimiento, la formaci√≥n y deportes Destac√≥ como referentes la programaci√≥n de Semana Santa, que en el caso de la sede de Sevilla se traduce en tres exposiciones de Tramos de Cuaresma a la vez, y la de los Gozos de Diciembre, de especial tradici√≥n especialmente en las provincias en las que est√° m√°s implantada, como es Sevilla, Huelva, C√°diz y C√≥rdoba, que en su opini√≥n forman parte del ‚Äúideario colectivo‚Äù de la sociedad. Tambi√©n destac√≥ los programas solidarios como Andaluces Compartiendo o Cajasol Educa, con un enfoque que no s√≥lo busca aportar alimentos sino tambi√©n formaci√≥n e integraci√≥n, o la Escuela de Negocios del Instituto de Estudios Cajasol, con la que se busca que los que se formen ‚Äúreporten el valor a√±adido a su tierra‚Äù, con un 60% de alumnos becados. Env√≠a tu noticia a: [participa@andaluciainformacion.es](mailto:participa@andaluciainformacion.es)
